body.name: Rechargeable 8'' Lighted Makeup Mirror, 1X 10X Magnifying Vanity Mirror with 3 Color LED Lights, Touch Sensor Adjust Brightness Double-Sided Cosmetic Mirror, Gold Finish
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 48 mins
features: Dimmable 3 Color Lighting - ①This makeup mirror has built-in stable LED Lights and have 3 different lighting: white light, natural light, and warm light, you can tap the sensor button to switch 3 light colors. ②Short press the sensor switch to on/off the light. And long-press the touch button to adjust the brightness to meet whatever your needs/preferences.

Dual-Sided 1X/10X Magnifying - ①This lighted mirror one side is 1x and another is 10x magnification. It is rotation, you can see your entire face, also specific parts. ②with magnifying mirror, applying mascara, wearing contact lenses, and eyebrow tweezing, shaving, and facial care become easier. (Keep a distance of approximately 4 inches when using a magnifying mirror)

Rechargeable & Cordless - ①This lighted makeup mirror is built in a 2000mAh rechargeable battery. Save the cost of buying a regular battery. The package includes a charging USB cord, attach it to your existing phone adapter, power bank, or computer to charge. ②For the cordless design, the mirror is movable, it can be taken to wherever you want.

360° Rotation 8-inch Mirror - ①The mirror face can be rotated 360 degrees. you can switch between the 1x side and 10X mirror freely, and adjust the correct position to get a comfortable viewing angle when you putting on makeup. ②This 8-inch larger size magnifying mirror with light provides a high-definition clarity wide-angle viewing, helping you achieve flawless makeup.

18-Month Guarantee - ①We offer an 18-month replacement guarantee for this lighted magnifying mirror, contact us through the Amazon message center if there is any issue. ②The mirror is made of metal, which is very durable, the best choice gift. The base is removable, so it is comfortable for carrying when you travel.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why should I choose this rechargeable lighted makeup mirror? ✔3 different color lighting option This makeup mirror with lights and magnification is perfect, it has 3 different lighting choices: white light, natural light, and warm light, so it's great to see how your makeup looks in different lighting. ✔Double-sided 1x/10x Magnification Design 10x magnification is great for everything from putting on lipstick, removing contacts, touching up make-up, eyeliner, eyebrow tweezing, mascara, eye shadow, or any other viewing needs. 10x magnification is perfect to zoom in on your facial features so that even your tiniest pore can be seen clearly. ✔Rechargeable Built-in Battery and Wireless As our mirror built-in a 2000mAh rechargeable battery, You do not have the trouble of replacing the battery again and again. Just use the USB cable to charging it. ✔Adjustable Angles Mirror Face You can move the mirror face freely for getting great viewing at any angle, because of the 360° swivel joint design. For the best view, please maintain a viewing distance of 4 inches. ✔Top-Grade LED Lights and Stepless Dimmable This makeup mirror with the brightest and best-LED lighting system. Because the stepless dimmable design, you can adjust the brightness from 0 to 100% at random, and get any level of brilliance you prefer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Both Classic and Modern. Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: Pros:I gave this mirror 5-stars because it did the job very well and appears to be well-designed and well-constructed. I've only used it 2 weeks, but so far, no issues at all. Good size mirror surface. Clarity on both sides. Lighting options work great and look great. I experienced no distortion on the 10x side of mirror, which was a relief because I've done "mirror research" and some reviewers of similar-type MAG mirrors complained of distortion. The mirror looks nice and somehow manages being substantial in size but not clunky. The design is classic and modern at the same time. Sturdy. I haven't needed to recharge it yet, so I can't speak on that!Cons:This really isn't an actual "con" toward this mirror, but I wanted a little more magnification. Even though I understood it was 10x I was hoping for more "pop". My eyesight would have preferred more , but actually I could still see everything I needed to see. Lighting could have been a tad brighter - but I'm sure lighting is a subjective experience. Note to manufacturer: could you please make a mirror just like this - but with a higher magnification? (Of course, sometimes it's scary to see "things" that close, but I figure it's better I see it and not someone else! lol)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great features for good price
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy with my purchase of this lighted magnifying makeup mirror. I had been browsing a ton of different models from different sellers, trying to figure out what I wanted, and this mirror is it.First, I like the location of the charging port and style of charger - it doesn't detract from the design of the mirror at all, and it doesn't seem likely to get easily damaged. When charging, there is a red glow from within the light casing of the mirror, and it turns green when fully charged. I also love that this mirror is rechargeable - it's so light and easy to move around and it's nice that I don't have to be tethered to a power outlet all the time.Second, it's got two different levels of magnification which was the main reason I bought the mirror. The highly magnified side is great for plucking difficult hairs or correcting makeup, and the slightly magnified side helps me make sure I'm applying my makeup smoothly. The swiveling mirror head makes it easy to swap between the two sides.Third, it has 3 different colors of lighting which are very useful to counteract my terrible bathroom lighting, and help show me what my makeup will look like in different lighting. No surprises when I go outside into the sunlight!Finally, I've used it every day since I got it, for a little over an hour at a time. So far, I've had no problems with it. It doesn't heat up around the light, mirror, or base when in use (at least for an hour) so I have no problems handling it or putting it away after use. It comes with a nice little cloth for wiping smudges or fingerprints off of the mirror, which I think is a really nice inclusion - you'd hate to scratch your brand new mirror with a rough cloth. This mirror is perfect for daily home use and I'm very happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, is portable
reviews.reviewText: Very bright and dims! Love the magnifying side as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works so good in fact it’s self lighted too
reviews.reviewText: I am returning/replacing it. I love the technology and that I can move the mirror around. However, it turns it self on…… and yes just like all the rest said. In the middle of the night. So I’ll see if it does it again with the new one. Wish I would have read the reviews first. I would have chosen another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and excellent customer service!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror works great. I like the size, the lighting with the 3 different settings the choice of normal magnification on one side and higher magnification on the other side and the convenience of the rechargeable battery, which keeps a long charge. Also, I needed assistance with the charger and the seller responded quickly and provided excellent customer service. I'm very happy with this product and seller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Was 5-star, after 12 months is now 1-star!
reviews.reviewText: 5/24/23 UPDATE:I wrote the manufacturer again on 3/26/23 and warned them that I if I didn't get a response, I would report them to Amazon for shady business practices, regarding the mirror that died within their stated 18-month warranty period. Mind you, I had already spoken with Amazon about this once already as well and they were trying to get the manufacturer to respond to me (to no avail). My final warning got them to finally respond that they would replace the mirror. At that time I had asked for tracking information to be sent to me when they had it. Crickets again. I had to write another time to get the tracking information sent. The replacement mirror did finally arrive. So they did finally make it right. I'm not increasing the stars rating though, it took far too much effort on my part to get them to honor their warranties. Do yourself a favor and take your business elsewhere. This company will not be getting anymore of my money, that is for sure!2/14/23 UPDATE:Loved at first, now Keeps turning itself on at random times!!!January 2023 marks the one year point of owning this makeup mirror and I have loved it. Until the last couple of weeks. I'm typing this review on 2/14/2023 and as of the last couple of weeks, this make-up mirror has all of a sudden started turning itself on at random times. And those random times seem to mostly be at night! Talk about annoying. And no, apparently there is not an 18 month guarantee or warranty as I'm being completely ignored. I wrote on 2/9 and have heard nothing.Let's start with the good. I loved that it was rechargeable as I didn't have to have a cord in the way when I was using it. I use this in the bathroom when I get ready everyday (or night), so a cord outstretched is not ideal. And the battery charge lasts quite a long time... seems likes weeks before I have to even think about recharging it (and I only do that that it doesn't die on me all of a sudden, not because it has died).One side of the mirror is normal and the other is 10x magnification. Both sides are illuminated, which is fantastic. The light itself is dimmable and the light temperature can be changed from warm to mix to cool. Super useful to your likes.The base is weighted, and correctly so. I've never had an issue with knocking it over and yet, it's not crazy heavy or difficult to move around.The nitpicking points:- The mirror itself is a decent size, I do wish it was a little larger.- It's a usb charging cable, that doesn't not come with an adapter. Not sure how many people are actually using this type of mirror with their computer... I'm not. Just give me a normal plug, so I can plug it into a wall outlet without hunting for an adapter please (or give me the adapter).- The base has a tendency to unscrew from the stand. So I have to keep screwing it back in every so often.The Bad:- As already mentioned, it has all of a sudden started turning itself on at random times. Not sure why. I'll wake up in the middle of the night and it's on full brightness. So I will turn it off. Then in the morning... it's on again! What?! And then in the afternoon... it's on again. Annoying. Talk about battery drain.So now, I'm letting the battery drain and looking for a new one. I'm afraid to charge this thing again that there is some sort of short in it.Stay away from this. Clearly it's only good for a year and the warranty is a complete farce because it's complete crickets if you ask about that.
It was very bright. Now after 10 months the light is very dull, very disappointed. I don't see any way to contact seller. :/

reviews.reviewTitle: Rechargeable 8'' Lighted Makeup Mirror, 10X Magnifying Vanity Mirror
reviews.reviewText: Love it and use it everyday.

Been using for about a month or two now and still works great. People saying it’s not as bright as first day, I only notice this when the battery is getting low - as soon as you plug to charge the brightness comes back up again. Only complaint is the magnified side is definitely not 10x…more like 5 or 7 if I had to guess, my previous mirror was 10 and it was way more magnified than this “10”

Bought 2 for Christmas, one for my mom and in-law, 1 is working great- led light controls and accurate according to the description, compared the other one and the max brightness is a little bit darker and installed upside down, it annoys me cause the icon is on top and it’s blocking the mirror.

When I tell you that you need this product I mean it wholeheartedly. The light is outstanding, it feels very high quality and sturdy, and I just plucked my eyebrows more efficiently than I could have ever imagined in my 27 years of life. I am genuinely looking forward to the next time I can pluck and that thought has never crossed my mind before.I got it slightly on sale, but even full price I’d say it’s worth it. Face maintenance, makeup, whatever. Highly recommend.
